name: MagRacer Alpha
description:
Play the alpha version of MagRacer by Canopy Games today!

Want to see the course teaching you how to make this game a reality?  Back us on Kickstarter today!

We strongly recommend you use a controller.

While you can play this on the keyboard, you almost certainly don't want to.

Really and truly.

This game is heavily in production. Most of the assets are still being worked on. Several game features are yet to be added.  there will be bugs.  The options menu isn't done yet.  Etc.

MagRacer is a single player sci-fi racer.  Pilot your craft at breakneck speeds over a magnetized track, using pickups to gain an advantage over the other teams.

Unlike the Wipeout series this game was inspired by, MagRacer is not on rails; that is, we actually simulate the effect of being repelled by the track.  This allows you to fly over and under other craft, to power slide around corners and to slide safely under mines.  Flying a MagRacer takes skill and practice, rewarding your perseverance.

Use boost pads and mines, shield recharge and the terrifying Dragon's Breath weapon as you slide and power your way along the track to first place. 

This is a challenging game, and it will take practice.  It's physics based, so make use of strafe and brake to maintain control. 

Controls:

SteerLeft Analog StickA / DThrustRight TriggerWAir BrakeLeft TriggerSpaceStrafeShoulder ButtonsQ / EFireXBox: A / PS: CrossShiftSwitch CameraXBox: Y /  PS: TriangleV
